articles.title: ‘We'll find you and we won't let you live’ – a team’s fight to exist
articles.description: Afghanistan's women cricketers have escaped danger, but found only a sporting limbo in exile from their homeland.
articles.content:
Afghanistan have been a full member of the International Cricket Council since 2017 and as such are required to field a women's team
